thread.title: Motshekga takes on Sadtu

author: news24.com
title: Motshekga takes on Sadtu
text:
War has been declared between teacher’s union Sadtu and Basic Education Minister Angie Motshekga and her MECs, with Sadtu vowing they would defeat them as they had defeated apartheid, and the MECs saying the union should no longer be allowed to “disrupt” education.
The dispute over the Annual National Assessments (ANAs) has seen Motshekga and her MECs drawing a line in the sand, determined to stop Sadtu’s “inappropriate influence” on the education system.
Round two of the battle is scheduled for this afternoon when Motshekga and senior officials will meet with unions Sadtu and the National Professional Teachers’ Organisation of SA, where the issue will again be on the table. A senior education official told City Press that Motshekga was expecting “fireworks”.
To read what happened at a meeting to reinstate the ANAs on Thursday, and an explosive SMS from Sadtu general-secretary Mugwena Maluleke, buy your copy of City Press today.
